Get the delta y-component of the direction.

getOpposite

public Direction getOpposite()
Get the opposite direction of the current direction. The opposite direction is the negative of both x & y component.

Returns:
the Direction object that is the opposite of the direction.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object otherObject)
Two Direction objects are equal if the x and y direction of both objects are the same.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
otherObject - the other object to be compared with this Direction.
Returns:
true if equal, false otherwise.
